text: Hi, does anyone know why HubSpot is using ".jifif" as file format for assets? i read that it is a jpg but i am wondering why the file format is different  then
<@U02162GK9SP>  tell em how to create a header and footer.

The best way to create headers and footers is to use a global partial. Global partials can be included into your templates and enable content creators with the global content permission to modify any modules you have in your header or footer site wide.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/global-content#global-partials-vs-global-modules>

We recommend checking out the HubSpot boilerplate which is built using a lot of best practices for building out a theme.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes/HubSpot-cms-boilerplate>
Can you link to the file so we have context?

hi team. i normally add a redirection in domain settings to send user from no www to www. what other ways can i set this outside HubSpot? is it possible to do it in the domain provider? for example, setting the redirection through godaddy
If you use Cloudflare, you could set redirect rules there too.
thanks for answering :smile: and is it possible without using DNS ?
